Chimeric Illustration

"Make Our Lives Extra-Ordinary"

Mercutio has always, and will have a passion for Visual Arts, the fruits of bringing the vividly ethereal yet intangible qualities of a complicated phantasmagoric concept that's had months on one's mind; to those simple afternoon thoughts- to fruition; Breathing life into them, one way or another!

With goals to be a Reputable Artist and Illustrator working within a team of equally passionate individuals with amazing talent themselves! Mercutio Proudly wears their Creativity on their chest! As an Artist; Creative by trade with years of paint on their hands!

Fueled by a truly timeless passion for the Visual Arts and Dedication for Making the Intangible, Tangible.
